source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Lake sunset with rays of sun - Landscape

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint landscape and learn acrylic techniques with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, use of different shapes of brushes
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Simple Watercolor Landscapes; Paint Loose Monochrome Art

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Learn tips and tricks for paint expressive monochromatic watercolor landscapes & how to avoid rigid, tight art.
objectives_summary: You will learn to paint simple monochromatic watercolor landscape paintings.
You will learn to paint loose and expressive watercolor landscapes.
You will learn wet-in-wet techniques.

items.title: DIY Origami Gifts & Decoration
items.headline: Master the basics of Origami while giving them purpose
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to fold 21 traditional origami models
Understand the basic folding techniques
Get inspiration for your next gifts and decoration pieces

items.title: Creative Writing: The Mystery, Suspense, Crime Story
items.headline: The Mystery, Suspense, Crime Story
objectives_summary: Students will develop skills for writing a mystery-suspense-crime story.

items.title: Bill Origami Gifts
items.headline: A Beginner's Guide To Folding Creative 3D Origami Bills And Turn Them Into Gifts!
objectives_summary: Understand the folding techniques in origami
Be able to know how to create different origami models
Experience the traditional Japanese art

items.title: Watercolor masterclass - A complete guide to paint Seascapes
items.headline: Everything you need to know about painting realistic water and reflections
objectives_summary: Have a better understanding of using basic watercolour techniques
Understanding art supplies
How to approach the medium watercolor

items.title: Beginner Crochet - Learn to Crochet a beautiful blanket
items.headline: Learn the basics of crochet in detail and create your own beautiful blanket quickly and easily
objectives_summary: How to crochet a beautiful easy beginner friendly blanket
How to master the most important crochet skill
How to count and identify different stitches

items.title: Resin Coat an Artwork, for Beginners
items.headline: An essential basic course for using epoxy-resin
objectives_summary: How to apply a crystal clear, resin, top-coat to an artwork or photograph.

items.title: Learn to paint a pretty picture on canvas with acrylics.
items.headline: with Lina Jaramillo you learn to paint easily with new techniques and with a professional finish
objectives_summary: Learn to paint a artwork canvas professionally
You will learn to apply different techniques: applied resin, patinas, acrylics, shadows or gradients.
Learn to make your own canvas.

items.title: Realistic Pencil Drawing
items.headline: Create Realistic Drawings with Pencil
objectives_summary: The basic materials, tools, and surfaces for creating realistic drawings with pencil.
Why the element of art, value is so important to your success and how to use it in your drawings.
How to create the illusion of a variety of textures with pencil

items.title: Complete Drawing On The iPad Using ArtStudio

visible_instructors.name: Robin
visible_instructors.title: Robin Slee | Art | Illustration | iPad | Software Development
visible_instructors.display_name: Robin Slee | Art | Illustration | iPad | Software Development

items.headline: Digital Art on iPad, Apple Pencil, ArtStudio app. Create pencil like drawings with ease. Easy to follow tutorials.
objectives_summary: Confidently Navigate The ArtStudio Application
Customize The Default Pencil Tool To Replicate A 2B Pencil
Transfer Their Art Knowledge To Working On The iPad

items.title: Paint this exotic city: Watercolor painting in 3 EASY steps
items.headline: Watercolor painting, easy & fun! I show you step-by-step how to paint this lovely Mediterranean city. Beginners welcome!
objectives_summary: Paint a beautiful Mediterranean city painting in watercolor, in as little as 30 minutes
Learn that watercolors are easy and fun!
Have a great night of painting with your kids, class, or friends

items.title: Learn to wrap gifts like a Pro
items.headline: How to make a professional present packaging
objectives_summary: Professional gift wrapping
Making bows
Using extra accessories in gift wrapping

items.title: How to Draw 101: DRAWING & SKETCHING in 3D Using Perspective
items.headline: Understand Volumes, Depth & Space - Step by Step Guide on How to Draw Believable 3D Forms Using Perspective Drawing
objectives_summary: How to recognize the 3D structure of real-life subjects
How to draw & sketch simple & more complex forms in 3D
How to use perspective drawing to create the illusion of depth in the viewer

items.title: Animals with Pastels
items.headline: Learn how to draw animals with pastels.
objectives_summary: The basic materials, tools, and surfaces for working with pastels.
How different drawing surfaces play a major role in your success.
How to plan out your sketches and ensure accuracy in your drawings.

items.title: Beginners Guide To Sewing
items.headline: Learning How To Use Your Sewing Machine
objectives_summary: Know the sewing machine in's and out's
Thread a sewing machine
Wind a bobbin
